body.name: Smart Watches for Women [Alexa Built-in, Answer/Make Calls, 1.8"] Smartwatch with Heart Rate/SpO2/Sleep/Stress, 100 Sports, IP68 Waterproof, Pedometer Fitness Tracker for Samsung iPhone Android Phones
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 6 hrs 19 mins
features: 【Stay Connected & Alexa Built-in】With Bluetooth connectivity, the smart watch allows you to effortlessly handle calls, whether answering, rejecting, or initiating. Also, receive notifications from your smartphone, including SMS, Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn, etc., ensuring you stay connected with family and friends. Plus, the smart watches for women come with the Alexa voice assistant, so you can set alarms, check the weather, and control music with simple voice commands.

【Health & Night Sleep Tracker】The smartwatch women play a crucial role in your health by providing real-time insights into heart rate, blood oxygen, and stress. The fitness tracker watch takes it a step further by automatically tracking your sleep at night, offering a detailed analysis of sleep quality, including deep sleep, light sleep, and wakefulness. The VeryFit app allows you to review your weekly health analysis, facilitating the development of healthier sleep habits.

【100 Sports & IP68 Waterproof】Choose from over 100 sports modes on the fitness watches for women, tailoring your fitness tracking to your specific sports needs, whether it's walking, running, football, basketball, ect..The digital watch womens meticulously records steps, exercise duration, distance, and calories burned. With an IP68 waterproof rating, the android smart watch allowing you to wear it while washing hands or in the rain, making it easy to integrate into your daily routine.

【1.8" Touch Screen & 100+ Dials】The womens smart watches features a cutting-edge 1.8" HD touch screen, which enhances color quality and touch responsiveness for seamless use of various functions. Adjust brightness across 5 levels to ensure easy readability in any lighting. Express your personality with 100 watch faces and fully customizable watch faces in the VeryFit app, you can change your sports watches for women to fit your mood or the moment.

【Long Battery Life & Multifunction】The smart watch for iphone compatible serves as a versatile daily companion, offering practical features such as weather forecast, music control, camera control, find my phone, sedentary reminder, ect. to elevate your lifestyle. Powered by a high-capacity 300mAh battery, the activity trackers and smartwatches fully charges in just 2 hours for 7 days of daily use, and is compatible with iOS 9.0+ and Android 6.0+ smartphones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my daughter, she set it up to her phone very easily. In no time she was receiving text and calls. This is way cheaper than name brand and worked just as well. I am very pleased with this find.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I really like this watch
reviews.reviewText: Within hours of receiving this watch ang fully charging it, my dog got ahold of the charging cable and chewed it to pieces. I messaged customer service and within 24 hours the responded with the ASIN so I could purchase another one, and it was reasonably priced. The software is OK...I have one other smart watch to compare it to and I like that software better. But this certainly does the job. Keeps track of everything I want, lets me know when I've hit milestones and goals. They have a wide variety of different faces available on the store to customize it and I've always been able to find a free one I'm happy with (though they do have some cool ones that you can pay for). On the down side the watch answers the phone when I don't want it to and has even called back wrong numbers twice when I wasn't trying to place a call (and I had calls disabled at the time). Lastly it took a fall from the bathroom counter to the tile floor and the screen can no longer show black. The face is a kind of retro-70's brown...Not ideal but also not a deal breaker. I still wear it every day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All the functions I need without the Apple Watch price
reviews.reviewText: I really needed a watch that would be accurate and hopefully provide me with a few features I need because I work as a docent in a museum so I needed a way to keep track of my tours so I know how much time I have for each one. This watch has not left my wrist since I got it because it more than exceeds my expectations! The different designs for the watch face are really cool and I love that I can control my music from this, as well as my Alexa, and I can also monitor my sleep and my cardio. There are a few features that don't seem to sync up, like the weather function, but I don't mind it that much. I live in western Massachusetts so the weather is cold and/or rainy 90% of the time which I don't need a watch to tell me. It's also a little annoying that I will rearrange the order that the different screens on the watch show up in, and then it gets reset randomly, but again it's not a huge deal. The battery life is fantastic, and I do like that I can get calls and messages on it, and that I can also turn the Do Not Disturb feature on and not be bothered by notifications. Does this have every single feature that the Apple Watch has? No. Do I need those features? No. This does everything I need and I have no complaints at all so I'm really happy I found this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've had off brand smart watches before but this one reigns supreme! It has all of the fitness features I need and love and I'm able to make and receive calls. It doesn't have the feature of responding to text but you can read them. The battery life is good for me as it only needs to be charged every few days. It meets all of my basic needs so overall I'm happy with the product. I would recommend it to anyone looking for a smartwatch without all the extras.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice Design
reviews.reviewText: I hoping this watch has a longer life span than the last "off-brand" watch I ordered, which was great until it just started charging after 8 months. So far this has been great: features are all easy to navigate and display is nice and clear; has a good variety of functions but not an overwhelming array, which is what turned me off some of the other watches, and has a smaller face design which works wells with my strangely small wrist. I like the wider strap it comes with and you can change it out with any strap that's compatible. Good battery life per charge; I just hope it lasts longer than 8 months!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars REVISED 11/11/23 - not AN Excellent value smart watch
reviews.reviewText: REVISION 11/11/23- I still can't connect to Alexa nor the app. The time has reset to something else and there are no instructions on how to change it. I have contacted customer service and have not heard back in more than a week. Very disappointing. I can not recommend this watch, nor the company.I'm still working out which functions I need, but this is a very decent watch for the price. I haven't been able to connect to Alexa and am still having trouble with using it with my phone (keypad is too small for my fingers), but that's OK. I usually have my phone close by anyway. And I like the find my phone feature!The app is a good one, and has a very detailed instruction manual - the one included with the watch is little more than a quick-start guide. Workouts are a different function than activities, and there are plenty of workouts to go through - even elliptical, which is one I use the most. Seems to give good readings for pulse, oxygen, etc.. The music and camera controls also work well.All in all a good watch for the money; a good first step if you're looking to get into this, and may be all you need. It certainly is for me. Recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This is a great starter watch
reviews.reviewText: The price is very fair for this. It's not really comparable to an apple watch or fitbit, but it really is a good and affordable alternative. I'd recommend this for a teen or someone not too invested in quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Chance to Experience a Smart Watch
reviews.reviewText: Alexa will turn on and off my Amazon Fire TV through this Gydom Smart Watch for Men. It will switch HDMI inputs on the TV through the Alexa option. The watch will pause, play, and advance YouTube videos and YouTube Music on my Android phone (Galaxy S9+). The watch will notify me of incoming gmail and messages. It will find my phone wherever I set the phone down. It will start and stop recording a video or snap a photo on my phone. It is a timer, a stopwatch, and an alarm clock. It gives a brief weather report and two day forecast. I won't go into the health and exercise aspects, because I am so busy working on my ranch that I don't have time or need to have a structured exercise type of lifestyle. It will take my pulse if I sit real still. It will not take my oxygen level. This is probably due to my age, skin, and body fat characteristics which are no doubt outside of the cohort which went into the design of the watch. The watch is very light weight and comfortable. It shakes off water like a dog shakes off water. Really, there is a function that does that. You swipe down and there is a raindrop symbol. Press that and the watch starts its little water shake dance. Yeah, it's pretty smart I would say.
J’adore pouvoir personnalisé l’écranFacile d’utilisationJe trouve l’écran un peu grand mais on s’y faitJ’espère que le bracelet tiendra dans le tempsSinon très agréable à utiliser

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've had a few smart watches and tried Google wear and Honor. Honor had the great battery life although the app has to be sideloaded, and the Google wear chomped through battery life! This watch gives you both long battery life and an easy to use app from the Google Play store. There are various watch faces to choose from, customisable app notifications and you can even answer calls. What I really like about this smart watch was the ability to change the band. The one supplied is very soft and comfortable, great for sleeping however if you wanted to wear this out I'd purchase a fabric or leather replacement. Watch arrived in a nice presentation box too.
Die Snartwatch ist sehr kommunikativ. Dabei hält die Batterie sehr lange durch. Einfa zu bedienen, einfach zu empfehlen.

L’orologio é stato regalato a Natale. Quindi scrivo dopo 10 giorni di test.La spedizione:Velocissima, il prodotto arriva nella sua scatola originale nuova, contenuta in una scatola Amazon.Al momento dell’apertura non presentava alcun difetto.Venditore molto presente:Mi ha mandato subito un messaggio/mail con il manuale e si é reso disponibile per qualunque eventuale problema (ottimo👍🏻)Come da istruzioni abbiamo caricato l’orologio prima di usarlo, ma era già al 99% di batteria quindi ci é voluti poco.Abbiamo scaricato l’app su un Samsung galaxy A51, nessun problema di compatibilità o lentezza. L’abbinamento bluetooth tra lo smartwatch e il telefono é avvenuto subito, senza problemi.Non é stato necessario impegnarsi nel posizionarlo o stringere il cinturino, le misurazioni funzionano bene e le informazioni tra i due dispositivi sono quasi immediate.É molto comodo sia per le chiamate che per i messaggi. Ha tante funzioni utili per chi va in palestra e vuole tenere sotto controllo i valori più importanti. Ha molti programmi di allenamento ma non li abbiamo ancora provati.La durata della batteria é ottima!Quindi a meno di sorprese posso dire che il rapporto qualità prezzo é più che positivo. 👍🏻

Jolie montre rose pâle pas criard, élégante et féminine⌚ L'écran est entièrement personnalisable via l'application dédiée,on peut y mettre nos propres photos ou choisir dans les fonds disponibles.⌚ légère et facile à porter, elle passe partout peu importe la situation ou la tenue.⌚ L'écran est super réactif, pas besoin de s'y reprendre en plusieurs fois⌚ Elle dispose de l'assistance vocale on peut donc la contrôler avec la voix comme on le fait sur notre téléphone.⌚ Elle reçoit les messages, les notifications de la plupart des applis mais le plus important c'est qu'elle permet d'appeler et recevoir des appels.⌚ L'audio bidirectionnel permet d'entendre via la montre, mais donc aussi de parler. Ça fait un peu série des années 80 de se voir parler à sa montre, mais dans certaines situations ça peut s'avérer bien pratique.⌚ La charge est rapide, quelques heures pour environ une semaine d'autonomie en sachant que ça dure plus longtemps si on désactive les suivis automatiques dont on n'a pas besoin.⌚ Le prix est très raisonnable, 34€99 à l'heure de ce test pour une montre compatible Android et iOS et qui rappelle beaucoup le design de la marque à la pomme.C'est un très bon compromis !
